channel.title: Rate My Site (Made From Scratch) 10m+ views
channel.description:
I made this website from scratch it is made for my server and i just finished it yesterday so i wanted to know how i was doing rate me from 1 to 10 1 being the lowest 10 being the highest
[url=http://www.fallenripper.co.nr]My Site[/url]

item.title: Rate My Site (Made From Scratch) 10m+ views
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:52, topic:214861”]php is much easier:
[php]

<? $input = isset(STDIN) ? STDIN : $_GET['input']; echo ucwords($input); ?>[/php][/quote]

perl is much easier:

while (<STDIN>) { s/(^| )(\p{Punct}*)(\w)/$1$2\U$3/g; print; }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:48, topic:214861”] public static String ToCaps(String s) { char[] c = s.ToCharArray(); c[0] = char.ToUpper(c[0]); for (int i = 0; i < c.Length; i++) { if (c[i] == ' ') c[i + 1] = char.ToUpper(c[i + 1]); } return new String(c); } [/quote]

What if the last character is a space?

item.title: Rate My Site (Made From Scratch) 10m+ views
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

public static String ToCaps(String s)
{
    char[] c = s.ToCharArray();
    c[0] = char.ToUpper(c[0]);
    for (int i = 0; i < c.Length; i++)
    {
        if (c[i] == ' ')
            c[i + 1] = char.ToUpper(c[i + 1]);
    }
    return new String(c);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Rate My Site (Made From Scratch) 10m+ views
item.dc:creator: @DarkImp DarkImp
item.description:
@DarkImp wrote:

I Am Sorry But FreeWebs SUCKS It Like A Noob cemetery Noobs That Dont Have Any Idea How To Code In Html And Php And Javascript Go There Then They Die
Here Is Some Things To Help You Out
1: Dont Show off Your WebSite The Very First Day You Make It Work
2: Create Your Own Idea’s Dont Take Things From Other Sites(The Chat Box ‘Make Your Own’) Be Fresh Just Make SomeThing That Noone Has Ever Done That Way You Will Get More People Coming To Your Site
3: Be Ready To Spend Alot Of Time Makeing It Websites Dont Just Pop Up In A Day You Have To Take Months And Months To Make It Be perfect See If You Took A Very Long Time To Create It You Have Deserved The Right To Advertise it Take A Look At Some Of The Best Sites Around They All Have Different Idea’s And It Looks Like They Really Put Their Time Into It

Ok Now I Know This Is Your Frist WebSite But I Gave You Good Amount Of Tips And Yes Sites Pop Up Almost Every Day But Do They BeCome One Of The Best Sites in The World ‘No’ They Dont Becuase They Didnt Put There Time Into It. So These Tips Are About The Best You Can Get Cuase This Is The Basic Idea Of How People Plan There Site The Think About It Then They Spend Alot Of Time Working On That So Please If you Want A Great Site Please Take Your Time The World Isnt Gonna End Before You Finsh It. Most People Invite Me To There Sites Just To See What It Looks Like And They Say “Arnt I The Best Html Coder Ever” And I Have To Go To My Inbox And Write A Message About How Crappy It Looks And Stuff So To Save Us All Time Just Use My Tips And If You Need Help Go To Google “Google Is Your Friend” Alright Well I Hope You Do Better Next Time

Your Buddy,
Cody[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 10:01:22 am[/size][hr]If You Dont Belive Me This Is The Page Soruce
